protocol.text: The data was analyzed with GeneSpring GX (vers. 7.3.1) from Agilent. Preprocessing was performed with included RMA Plugin. ID_REF =  VALUE = RMA signal intensity
Arabidopsis thaliana (accession Columbia) were grown in the greenhouse under constant temperature of 20°C, 35% humidity and a 18-h light period.

For RNA extraction RNeasy Plant Mini kit was used ( according instructions from Quiagen). Extracted RNA was precipitated 100ul RNA; 8 µl 3 M Sodium acetate (pH 5.2); 2 µl Glycogen(5mg/ml); -80°C over night. then 30 min 13000 rpm 4°C. 2 times washing with 70% ethanol. resuspended in DEPC water. RNA quantity and integrity were assessed using RNA 6000 Nano LabChip Kit and the BioAnalyzer software (Agilent).
1µg of total RNA were used to synthesize amplified labeled cRNA (MessageAmp™ II aRNA Biotin Amplification Kit; Ambion).

After fragmentation of cRNA using the RNA Fragmentation Reagents (Ambion), 15 µg of cRNA was hybridized to Affymetrix Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Array (ATH1-121501; GEO accession GPL198) according to manufacturers manual. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450 using the protocol 'EukGE-WS2V4'.
GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix GeneChip® scanner GS3000 7G according to manufacturers manual.
